channel.title: [REQ] Summoning Tab Tutorial [REQ]
channel.description: I need a tutorial on making a working summoning interface for a 317 [PI]. My summoning skill is working perfectly, and so do the familiars, just when you summon a familiar, you can't dismiss it. I need a tutorial on how to create a working summoning tab. Thanks.
